DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether food intake response large portion size differs woman receive portion-control training woman receive training . In crossover design , woman come laboratory four occasion eat lunch seven food vary energy density . Across meal , food vary portion size ( 100 % , 125 % , 150 % , 175 % baseline amount ) . Food energy intake determine meal . Participants two group : woman complete one-year weight-loss trial train portion-control strategy , woman receive training ( community control ) .
